html.head:
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="32x32" href={favicon.url}>
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.bunny.net">
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://lf9-cdn-tos.bytecdntp.com" crossorigin>
<!-- 添加 MiSans 字体但保持响应式布局 -->
<script>
  // 动态创建和添加字体样式，避免干扰响应式布局
  (function() {
    // 创建style元素
    var style = document.createElement('style');
    style.type = 'text/css';
    
    // 定义字体样式
    var css = `
      @font-face {
        font-family: 'MiSans';
        src: url('https://lf9-cdn-tos.bytecdntp.com/cdn/expire-1-M/Mi-Sans/1.0/MiSans-Regular.ttf') format('truetype');
        font-weight: normal;
        font-style: normal;
        font-display: swap;
      }
      
      @font-face {
        font-family: 'MiSans';
        src: url('https://lf9-cdn-tos.bytecdntp.com/cdn/expire-1-M/Mi-Sans/1.0/MiSans-Bold.ttf') format('truetype');
        font-weight: bold;
        font-style: normal;
        font-display: swap;
      }
    `;
    
    // 将CSS添加到style元素
    if (style.styleSheet) {
      style.styleSheet.cssText = css; // IE
    } else {
      style.appendChild(document.createTextNode(css));
    }
    
    // 将style元素添加到文档头部
    document.head.appendChild(style);
    
    // 延迟设置字体族，确保不会干扰初始响应式布局加载
    setTimeout(function() {
      document.body.style.fontFamily = "'MiSans', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif";
    }, 50);
  })();
</script>

en.title: 非典型设计研究室 | AtypicalDesignLab
en.description: 非典型设计研究室是一个创意设计研究机构，成立于2021年，致力于本土化的当代独立设计方法研究与实践。

content.html:
非典型设计研究室是一个创意设计研究机构，成立于2021年，致力于本土化的当代独立设计方法研究与实践。

通过应用跨学科的方法和前沿设计理论，在本土设计学领域开展系统性研究。

-

Atypical Design Lab is a creative design research institution, established in 2021, dedicated to the research and practice of localized contemporary independent design methods.

By applying interdisciplinary approaches and cutting-edge design theories, it conducts systematic research in the field of local design studies.

-

○ 创始人 / 黄轶昊 Davy Huang

code.html:
{#each teasers as teaser}
{#if teaser.image.url} {/if}

{teaser.title}

{@html teaser.body.html}
{#if teaser.link.url} {teaser.link.label} {/if}
{/each}

body.html: We are a beacon of commitment towards preserving our forests. In the embrace of nature, we stand steadfast, advocating for the voiceless sentinels of our ecosystem. Together, we forge a path towards a greener tomorrow.
body.markdown: We are a beacon of commitment towards preserving our forests. In the embrace of nature, we stand steadfast, advocating for the voiceless sentinels of our ecosystem. Together, we forge a path towards a greener tomorrow.

body.html: Eager to leave a green footprint? Lend your hands to Lorem Ipsum Dolor. Each seed you sow, every forest you help clean, and every conversation you initiate about the importance of trees, echoes in our mission. Every action matters!
body.markdown: Eager to leave a green footprint? Lend your hands to Lorem Ipsum Dolor. Each seed you sow, every forest you help clean, and every conversation you initiate about the importance of trees, echoes in our mission. Every action matters!
